original_title: 超・時空変態人間2 セクシータイム・アゲイン
overview: Yurie, the only daughter of Sakima Hospital, whom Michio, a reluctant pharmaceutical salesman, was sent to as a last chance, was a classmate whom Michio admired in high school, but she was about to marry her fiancé. Michio is heartbroken, but he tries to change his fate with a mysterious remote control that can turn back time by 10 minutes with one touch given to him by a strange patient.
title: Super Space-Time Pervert 2: Sexy Time Again
